tool_description: Render GLB/glTF 3D models as a transparent image.
name: GLB 2 PNG
title: GLB 2 PNG

api_list.name: Render GLB/glTF URL
api_list.description: Renders GLB/glTF 3D models as an image.

required_parameters.name: params
required_parameters.description:
- `rh`: rotation horizontal, for example `rh:-45`
- `rv`: rotation vertical, for example `rv:15`
- `s`: size in pixel, for example `s:128`
- `var`: name of the material variant (if applicable) which should be rendered, for example `var:street`

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://glb-2-png.p.rapidapi.com/rh:-45,rv:15,s:512/u/https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2FKhronosGroup%2FglTF-Sample-Models%2Fmaster%2F2.0%2FMaterialsVariantsShoe%2FglTF%2FMaterialsVariantsShoe.gltf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "glb-2-png.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://glb-2-png.p.rapidapi.com/{params}/u/{url}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "glb-2-png.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
